long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website URL to QR is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that instantly generates a QR code for any website URL you visit. With just a click, you can create a QR code for the current page and scan it on your mobile device to open the link effortlessly. Ideal for users who want to switch between desktop and mobile browsing without typing long URLs.

Key Features:

One-Click QR Code Creation: Quickly generate a QR code for any webpage with a single click.
Easy Sharing: Scan the QR code directly from your desktop screen to your phone â€“ perfect for sharing links, reading on the go, or saving content to mobile.

Downloadable QR Codes: Save the generated QR code as a PNG image for future use, print it, or share it with others.

Why Use Website URL to QR? Website URL to QR was created to bridge the gap between desktop and mobile browsing. We understand how frustrating it can be to manually type out long web addresses on a phone. Website URL to QR offers a fast and convenient way to scan and open any URL from desktop to mobile. It's designed to make browsing seamless, efficient, and effortless.

Who is this for? Anyone who frequently switches between desktop and mobile browsing, needs to share links quickly, or prefers a smoother way to open URLs on their phone.
